movie.actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover
movie.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
movie.title: Back to the Future

movie.actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Thomas F. Wilson
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 7 nominations.
movie.plot: Marty McFly has only just gotten back from the past, when he is once again picked up by Dr. Emmett Brown and sent through time to the future. Marty's job in the future is to pose as his own son to prevent him from being thrown in prison. Unfortunately, things get worse when the future changes the present.
movie.title: Back to the Future Part II
movie.writer: Robert Zemeckis (characters), Bob Gale (characters), Robert Zemeckis (story), Bob Gale (story), Bob Gale (screenplay)

movie.actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen, Thomas F. Wilson
movie.plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.
movie.title: Back to the Future Part III
movie.writer: Robert Zemeckis (characters), Bob Gale (characters), Robert Zemeckis (story), Bob Gale (story), Bob Gale (screenplay)
